text: Hello everyone!  I have cloned the site search module in HubSpot and have made some modifications.  One thing I am trying to do is add descriptions to the site search suggestions that pop up when typing in the search bar.  The desired result would be the same as on the search results page after you type in the search and hit enter.  Any help on how I can do this is greatly appreciated!
have you ever faced a problem with HubSpot cache? for example, i've made some changes in my blog listing template but i can't see them even in private mode of my browser
<@U017J1W2X8R> - I encountered something the other day.  Try adding ?hsDebug=True to the end of the URL and see if the page looks the way you want it to.
thank you for response, i was already able to see it in the preview, but the visitors don't haha
i wonder how many hours do i have to wait xd
yeah, unfortunately I don't know how to clear the cache.  I have to wait about 2 - 3 hours to see the changes one day last week
